name: Green Valley
description:
With your friends or by yourself. It's up to you to turn this small farm into a big and gigantic farm area.
In this farm, you have to plant your products and take care of your animals. You can sell or develop the products and animal products you collect. If you can earn enough gold, you can buy vehicles and farm larger areas. You can earn gold by selling your products in the market or in the market according to their category.

ANIMALS

You can get eggs, milk and meat with your chickens, sheep and cows. You can sell these products or combine them to obtain other products.
Raising animals on the farm can provide you with extra gold and resources for different machines.
You can get meat from sheep, milk from cows, eggs from chickens.

REBUILD


The decorations and locations of your farm are under your control. You can buy new builds or relocate existing ones to your farm.
With your friends or by yourself. It's up to you to turn this small farm into a big and gigantic farm area.
Farmer ? Hunter ? Trader ? Everything is under your control in the green valley. Sow your field, feed your animals, and go hunting in the forest. Don't forget to develop your products and sell them for a much higher amount of gold!
